data.text:
@orlandosentinel August 2020- 9,047 DEAD FLORIDIANS! 

March 2022- 70,249 DEAD FLORIDIANS!

If I were you DeSantis Id start packing your golf bag vacuuming the mansion and moving to Texas.

Because you're just that bad when it comes to the health and safety of FLORIDIANS!
@CindyAn52986016 @orlandosentinel @GovRonDeSantis I would LOVE to see your evidence to this. Here's all mine that says you're ridiculously wrong. https://t.co/bFre25JL2D

@DontBeAfraidFYI @orlandosentinel @GovRonDeSantis He told children yesterday to take their masks off that it was ridiculous that they had them on. Masks significantly reduce the inhalation of airborne disease. SCIENCE.! THE SPREAD WILL ONLY BE STOPPED WHEN EVERYONE GETS VAXED!

@CindyAn52986016 @orlandosentinel @GovRonDeSantis I'd LOVE to see your evidence that he's endangering people's health by allowing them the CHOICE to have a mask on, when we know for the last 2 years masks have done statistically nothing to stop the spread.
@orlandosentinel So many issues to pick and @GovRonDeSantis wants to endanger people's health. Time for  a new governor.
@VnesseS @orlandosentinel State like ny with mask and vaccine mandate doing worse in numbers than Florida so prove that not wearing a mask results in more deaths
@nyactionplus @orlandosentinel Freedom to be dead? Neither he can't tell me not to wear one, nor the opposite!
@orlandosentinel I have been for quite a while. They are of minimal, if any, value.

@orlandosentinel ONE THING IS CERTAIN: over 250 Million Vaccinated Americans believing in our President Joe Biden remain stade fast in making sure that we continue to drive all the support necessary to you, your countryman to resolve this humanitarian crisis as soon as possible! UKRAINE STRONG💪
